actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to authorize payment of a claim settlement on behalf of a former Congressional employee in the case of Ronald V. Dellums, et al. v. James M. Powell, et al.

summary.text: Authorizes the Senate Committee on Rules and Administration to pay a specified sum from its contingent fund in total satisfaction of all remaining claims against a named individual.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize payment of a claim settlement on behalf of a former Congressional employee in the case of Ronald V. Dellums, et al. v. James M. Powell, et al.
